member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.StringFormatMethodAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that marked method builds string by format pattern and (optional) arguments. Parameter, which contains format string, should be given in constructor. The format string should be in -like form

member.name: M:JetBrains.Annotations.StringFormatMethodAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: Specifies which parameter of an annotated method should be treated as format-string

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.InvokerParameterNameAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the function argument should be string literal and match one of the parameters of the caller function. For example, has such parameter.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.AssertionMethodAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the marked method is assertion method, i.e. it halts control flow if one of the conditions is satisfied. To set the condition, mark one of the parameters with attribute

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.AssertionConditionAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the condition parameter of the assertion method. The method itself should be marked by attribute. The mandatory argument of the attribute is the assertion type.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.AssertionConditionType
member.summary: Specifies assertion type. If the assertion method argument satisifes the condition, then the execution continues. Otherwise, execution is assumed to be halted

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.AssertionConditionType.IS_TRUE
member.summary: Indicates that the marked parameter should be evaluated to true

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.AssertionConditionType.IS_FALSE
member.summary: Indicates that the marked parameter should be evaluated to false

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.AssertionConditionType.IS_NULL
member.summary: Indicates that the marked parameter should be evaluated to null value

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.AssertionConditionType.IS_NOT_NULL
member.summary: Indicates that the marked parameter should be evaluated to not null value

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.TerminatesProgramAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the marked method unconditionally terminates control flow execution. For example, it could unconditionally throw exception

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.CanBeNullAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the value of marked element could be null sometimes, so the check for null is necessary before its usage

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.NotNullAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the value of marked element could never be null

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.CannotApplyEqualityOperatorAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the value of marked type (or its derivatives) cannot be compared using '==' or '!=' operators. There is only exception to compare with null, it is permitted

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.BaseTypeRequiredAttribute
member.summary: When applied to target attribute, specifies a requirement for any type which is marked with target attribute to implement or inherit specific type or types

member.name: P:JetBrains.Annotations.BaseTypeRequiredAttribute.BaseTypes
member.summary: Gets enumerations of specified base types

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.UsedImplicitlyAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the marked symbol is used implicitly (e.g. via reflection, in external library), so this symbol will not be marked as unused (as well as by other usage inspections)

member.name: M:JetBrains.Annotations.UsedImplicitlyAttribute.#ctor(JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseFlags)
member.summary: Initializes new instance of UsedImplicitlyAttribute with specified flags
member.param: Value of type indicating usage kind

member.name: P:JetBrains.Annotations.UsedImplicitlyAttribute.Flags
member.summary: Gets value indicating what is meant to be used

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.MeansImplicitUseAttribute
member.summary: Should be used on attributes and causes ReSharper to not mark symbols marked with such attributes as unused (as well as by other usage inspections)

member.name: M:JetBrains.Annotations.MeansImplicitUseAttribute.#ctor(JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseFlags)
member.summary: Initializes new instance of MeansImplicitUseAttribute with specified flags
member.param: Value of type indicating usage kind

member.name: P:JetBrains.Annotations.MeansImplicitUseAttribute.Flags
member.summary: Gets value indicating what is meant to be used

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseFlags
member.summary: Specify what is considered used implicitly when marked with or

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseFlags.Default
member.summary: Only entity marked with attribute considered used

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseFlags.IncludeMembers
member.summary: Entity marked with attribute and all its members considered used

member.name: T:Rsdn.Scintilla.NotifyHeader
member.summary: Не испольтзуется. Я так понял что для совместимости с стандартными аргументами WM_NOTIFY
